title: Travis Scott leaves dinner in LA amid claims the Kardashians 'want him to reunite with Kylie Jenner'
text:
Travis Scott has stepped out for dinner in Los Angeles amid claims that the Kardashian family want him to reunite with ex Kylie Jenner.

The rapper, 28, cut a casual figure as he left The Nice Guy restaurant in West Hollywood on Tuesday.

It comes following reports that Kylie's family are keen for her and Travis to rekindle their two year romance, with a source telling People they respect him as a partner and father to their daughter Stormi.

Busy: Travis Scott has stepped out for dinner in Los Angeles amid claims that the Kardashian family want him to reunite with ex Kylie Jenner

Travis cut a relaxed figure as he headed out for dinner with his pals, after suffering a nasty fall during a performance at the Rolling Loud Music Festival in Queens, New York on Sunday.

Addressing the crowd he said: 'I ain't gonna lie, I think I just broke my knee right now. But this show cannot stop just yet.'

Despite the injury, the music star seemed to be back to full health as he exited the restaurant, as speculation continues around his split from Kylie.

Relaxing: The rapper exited The Nice Guy Restaurant in West Hollywood, just days after injuring his knee during a performance in New York

Questions: It comes as it was reported that Kylie's family are keen for her and Scott to rekindle their romance, due to their respect of him as a partner and a parent

It was reported on Tuesday that Kylie's family are keen for them to reunite, with a source saying: 'Her family wants them to be together. Travis might not be perfect, but he's a great partner and dad.

'Everyone would be upset if Kylie can't figure things out with Travis.'

Following their split, Kylie and Travis have continued to co-parent their daughter Stormi, 20 months.

Meanwhile, it was recently claimed that part of the reason Travis and Kylie decided to call off their romance was over differing views on whether or not to expand their family.

Low-key: Travis seemed to be back to full health as he exited the California eatery after dislocating his knee during a performance

Jovial: Despite his recent injury, Travis was still in good spirits as he opted for velour black tracksuit bottoms and a simple bomber jacket

Busy: The music star had been performing in New York when he injured his knee during a fall, but quickly sprung back up to complete the show

A source previously said: '[Kylie] wanted to have a second baby [but Travis] did not.'

Keeping Up with the Kardashians star Kylie recently took to social media to insist her and Travis are on 'great terms' following their split.

Taking to her Twitter account, the reality TV star said: 'Travis and i are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi !! our friendship and our daughter is priority.
description: The rapper, 28, cut a casual figure as he left The Nice Guy restaurant in West Hollywood, amid claims that Kylie's family are keen for them to rekindle their romance.
